Cohen's kappa for categorical data

Source: R/trace_cat.R
kappa.Rd

Computes Cohen's kappa between two categorical matrices, treating each cell as a paired categorical observation.

Usage

kappa(a, b)

Arguments

a, b

Matrices or arrays of the same dimensions with categorical entries.
